text: Hi Zach. Any idea where I can see a list of available Company and Contact properties (name, address, phone, etc)?

<@U089BGUV473> You can use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/crm/properties|Properties API> for this. Using the "Contact" object type as an example:
```curl --location '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/properties/CONTACT>' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer pat-redacted'```
